general.gigTitle: develop website using PHP laravel and codeigniter

sellerCard.oneLiner: "To me, earning money is less important than being faithful"
sellerCard.description:
Hi! 
My name is Masuk and I believe that my strong points are reliability and responsibility , so that my number one goal will always be to satisfy your needs and achieve your goals.
 
 Main skills:
 *Web Development
*Web Design

description.content:
Are you searching for an experienced PHP Laravel web developer to create a Custom Functionality for your business? I am a PHP Laravel and CodeIgniter web developer with 3 Years Of experience in web development.


My top-notch Codeigniter & Laravel web development services are here to cater to all your needs.


I offer a range of custom web development services that use PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, MySQL, JavaScript, React, HTML5, and CSS3 Frameworks.I am committed to delivering the highest quality results:)


In this GIG I offer Laravel development services :


php Laravel Developer

Laravel & Codeigniter bug Fix Developer

Professional Codeigniter & laravel developer

php Laravel Script customization

install PHP laravel CodeIgniter Script

new features add existing PHP laravel Website

Full stack PHP developer

E-Commerce website Development

Payment gateway Setup (Paypal, Stripe, Squar)

Server setup & deploy (Include AWS cloud server)


==== Order requirement Message ======

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kinds of websites can you build using Codeigniter & Laravel?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have experience developing a wide range of websites using PHP Laravel, CodeIgniter including eCommerce sites, content management systems (CMS), social media platforms, online marketplaces, and more.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you approach adding new features to an existing project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My approach to adding new features to an existing project involves understanding the current architecture and codebase, identifying potential areas for improvement, and discussing the new features with you to ensure that they align with your business goals. I then work to implement the new features

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate third-party tools and applications into my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I can integrate a variety of third-party tools and applications into your Laravel website to improve its functionality and enhance the user experience.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer website design services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While my primary focus is website development, I can work with you to create a design that meets your needs or collaborate with a designer of your choice.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I need changes made to my website after it's been developed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I understand that your business needs can evolve over time, and I am happy to work with you to make any necessary changes to your website once it has been developed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Which payment gateways are you able to integrate?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have extensive experience integrating various payment gateways, including Credit Card Stripe and PayPal.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide documentation for the work you've completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide documentation for all of the work I've done on your website to ensure that you have a comprehensive record of everything that's been developed.
